header.name: I'm Dariusz
header.description: Welcome to my corner of the digital world! I'm a budding web developer fueled by a passion for creating captivating online experiences. With a background in graphic design and a newfound love for coding, I strive to craft visually appealing and functional interfaces that leave a lasting impression. I'm eager to collaborate and embark on transformative journeys, bringing digital dreams to life. Let's create wonders together!

about.heading: Welcome to my corner of the digital realm!

paragraph: Allow me to introduce myself — I am an emerging web developer fueled by a
for creating captivating online experiences. My journey has not been straightforward, but it has been filled with twists and turns that ultimately led me to the fascinating world of web development.
In the early days, I immersed myself in the

, attending a high school focused on this creative discipline. The allure of visual storytelling captivated me, inspiring dreams of crafting stunning visuals that captivate audiences. Eager to explore my artistic inclinations further, I studied sculpture and computer graphics during my college years. However, as fate would have it, I realized that these paths weren't my true calling.
During this introspective period, I stumbled upon
— a magical fusion of artistry and technical finesse. Intrigued by the power to shape the digital landscape, I decided to redirect my efforts towards web development.
With fervor and determination, I embarked on a series of immersive courses and online tutorials. Through these learning experiences, I honed my skills in
, mastering the foundational elements of web design. But my hunger for knowledge didn't stop there. I eagerly delved into the world of
, captivated by its versatility and the endless possibilities it offered.
Driven by a desire to create seamless and engaging user experiences, I ventured into the realm of
. These powerful frameworks became my allies, allowing me to breathe life into my visions and bring them to fruition on both web and mobile platforms.
As a web developer, my passion lies in crafting
that leave a lasting impact on users. The fusion of my background in graphic design and newfound technical prowess allows me to create harmonious digital spaces that blend

web developer to join your team, I would be thrilled to collaborate. Together, we can embark on a transformative journey, creating extraordinary digital experiences that leave a mark on the virtual landscape.

article.paragraph: Let's bring our digital dreams to life!

list: Creating semantically correct web pages.
Handling various elements such as headers, lists, forms, and multimedia.
Understanding the significance of attributes and their impact on page structure.
Applying modern HTML5 standards, including canvas and video elements.
Designing attractive and responsive user interfaces.
Creating animation effects and transitions using CSS3.
Using CSS preprocessors such as SASS for increased efficiency.
Understanding selector specificity and the cascading nature of CSS styles.
Using SCSS to write more maintainable and modular CSS code.
Leveraging variables, mixins, and nesting in SCSS.
Compiling SCSS to standard CSS for browser compatibility.
Integrating SCSS into frontend projects for improved styling.
Efficiently using Tailwind CSS for streamlined styling.
Writing concise and utility-first CSS with Tailwind.
Utilizing utility classes to speed up the styling process.
Integrating Tailwind CSS into frontend projects for rapid development.
Utilizing Bootstrap for rapid design of responsive user interfaces.
Using pre-built Bootstrap components and styles for efficient prototyping.
Customizing Bootstrap components to meet individual project requirements.
Integrating Bootstrap into frontend projects to enhance development speed.
Programming interactive web applications.
Exploring advanced libraries and frameworks, such as React, to enhance the interactivity of web applications.
Asynchronous programming using Promises and async/await.
Working with ES6 modules and managing dependencies.
Developing type-safe JavaScript applications using TypeScript.
Creating and using interfaces, types, and generics in TypeScript.
Transpiling TypeScript to JavaScript for browser compatibility.
Integrating TypeScript with popular frontend frameworks like React.
Building modern user interfaces using the React library.
Managing state using React Hooks and Redux.
Routing with React Router.
Integrating with external APIs and server communication.
Building performant and optimized React applications with Next.js.
Utilizing server-side rendering (SSR) and static site generation (SSG) for faster page loads.
Implementing smooth page transitions and client-side navigation.
Integrating Next.js seamlessly with React for a cohesive development experience.
Utilizing Firebase for scalable and real-time database solutions.
Implementing user authentication and authorization with Firebase Authentication.
Integrating Firebase Cloud Firestore for efficient data storage and retrieval.
Leveraging Firebase Hosting for deploying and hosting web applications.
Building dynamic web pages and web applications.
Working with databases, including MySQL.
Securing applications against attacks such as SQL Injection and XSS.
Creating servers and backend applications in the Node.js environment.
Using Express.js to build RESTful APIs.
Efficiently managing resources using npm or yarn.
Working with NoSQL databases like MongoDB for scalable and flexible data storage.
Creating and querying MongoDB databases and collections.
Using Mongoose ODM for Node.js to interact with MongoDB.
Designing schema-less data structures for various applications.
Managing relational databases using MySQL.
Creating and optimizing database schemas and queries.
Integrating MySQL with backend applications for data storage and retrieval.
Implementing database security and performance tuning.
Version control of source code using Git.
Branching and merging code.
Resolving conflicts and applying best practices in collaborative work.
Creating and managing repositories on the GitHub platform.
Efficiently using Visual Studio Code as a code editor.
Installing and configuring extensions for improved productivity.
Customizing keybindings and settings for a personalized coding environment.
Utilizing VS Code's debugging and version control features.

projects.Clouder: Weather forecast application. Weather API from openweathermap.
projects.Currency Calculator: Mobile and web application. Currency exchange rates API from weatherapi.com.
projects.React Chat: Chat application using Firebase and React.
projects.Simple JS Stopwatch: Stopwatch written in JavaScript. Interface inspired by Apple.

footer.react: Made with React. The library for web and native user interfaces.
footer.i18next: Used i18next. An internationalization-framework written in and for JavaScript.
